# Références  {.unnumbered}

## Paquets R {.unnumbered}


Ce livre a utilisé les paquets R listé dans le tableau @tab-Rlib.

```{r}
#| label: tab-Rlib
#| echo: FALSE
#| message: false
#| cache: false
library(tidyverse)
library(grateful)
pkgs <- cite_packages(
  output = "table",
  out.dir = "biblio/"
)
knitr::kable(
  pkgs,
  captions = "List of packages used in this book"
)
```
